      • determineTeamAmount

        public static java.lang.Integer determineTeamAmount(java.lang.Integer minTeams,
                                    java.lang.Integer maxTeams,
                                    java.lang.Integer playerCount)
        Determines the amount of teams the arena should have for a balanced game.
        Parameters:
        minTeams - The minimum amount of teams there should be.
        maxTeams - The maximum amount of teams there can be.
        playerCount - The current amount of players in the arena.
        Returns:
        The number of teams to provide a balanced game.
